page.title: 20 BICTON ARENA by V.ROBERTS
page.content: Tha Arena occupies a large area beside Bicton Gardens and is used about 12 times a year for equestrian events.I competed on about 10 occasions in 1984 on a dappled grey called SEFTON.I am now too old to enter Show Pony classes but still exercise Sefton & watch him being ridden.Looking after & riding Sefton from the farm where he is stabled is one of my main interests. Four of the Arena Shows each year are organised by the{South West Show Jumping Club}& these attract big names like Harvey Smith & David Broome. Such events are the most pulicised but Hunter Trials & 3-Day Events are also held. Half the Arena is a cross country course and the rest is the Main Arena with seating,other rings & temporary stables. {by Vanessa Roberts (aged 15) of Exmouth Community College}
